scriptLines: dealership as (name as string, location as string, inventory as (id as string, make as string, model as string, year as integer, specs as (engine as string, transmission as string, features as string[]), price as integer, maintenanceRecords as (date as string, service as string, details as (serviceCenter as string, mileage as integer, cost as double))[], rentalInfo as (availability as string, rentalRates as (daily as integer, weekly as integer, monthly as integer)))[], staff as (id as string, name as string, role as string, contact as (email as string, phone as string))[])
